name: Idle Dargons Think of Treasure
description:
An idle/clicker game about dargons. No, that is not a typo.

This is an early prototype. There are no proper graphics yet, but the game should be fully functional. A graphics version is planned, but there are no hard promises. Build a kingdom of dargons and collect shinies. Spend those shinies on various uprades that will help produce even more shinies. Loop forever and collect a treasure horde really worth sleeping upon.

Dargon: A reptilian type creature. Specifically bipedal, no wings, a breath weapon of any element (that isn't fire), and no natural innate magical ability (though this does not stop them from using magical artifact). - In case you didn't get it, it's a satire on how seriously people argue about dragon archetypes.
